{{Infobox Berry |name = #45 Payapa |image = [[File:Payapa.png]] |caption = This Berry is said to sense human emotions for the way it swells roundly when a person approaches. The same behavior affects nearby plants, causing additional mutations. |growtime = 9h 30m 0s |harvest = 30 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,900 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} == Description == '''Payapa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Wiki]], at least 1 [[Bluk]], at least 1 [[Cornn]] and at least 1 [[Pamtre]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 18 mins || 3 hours 18 mins || 6 hours 30 mins || 9 hours 30 mins - 19 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PayapaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PayapaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PayapaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (mutation rate) | ||
x1.1 ||
x1.2 ||
x1.3 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 9 hours 30 mins -
19 hours || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 6 hours 20 mins -
12 hours 40 mins || 76 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 4 hours 13 mins 20 secs -
8 hours 26 mins 40 secs || 51 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Payapa berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
